extendedInfo.description: MessagEase is a VERY different keyboard, unlike anything youâve seen or experienced before. If you are looking for yet another QWERTY keyboard with bells and whistles, MessagEase is not for you!But if you are open to new ideas and up for experiencing a completely new way of writing -- with a keyboard designed for ease, speed and accuracy -- you will be pleasantly, even shockingly, surprised at how well, how precise, how easy, and how fast you can text with MessagEase. Our current championâs speed is 80 Words Per Minute!Since MessagEase is very different, you must spend a few minutes to get used to it. Thousands of people have and they think itâs well worth it since MessagEase saves them hours and hours of agony. With MessagEase you type exactly what you want. No more embarrassing auto-corrects; no more guessing!We have tons of videos to help you become familiar with MessagEase quickly. Watch: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k3D3f3GWTSg There are many more on our YouTube channel. http://www.youtube.com/user/messageaseAlso, for you to learn MessagEase quickly, we have created MessagEase Game. Available for free on Google Play Market, MessagEase Game helps you come up to speed while having fun playing several games.MessagEase is the world's most innovative touch screen keyboard, revolutionizing text entry on mobile devices. It's the smartest keyboard for somartphones and tablets where the QWERTY keyboard is inefficient. It's also the ideal keyboard for Google Glass, Facebook Glass, Apple Glass, or any other AR glass. MessagEase essentially has 9 large keys with an ingenious letter assignment that is designed to maximize your speed and to ease your writing. It may take you a few minutes to learn this new way of writing. But you'll save hours by texting and writing faster.To see our instructions and descriptions, from the keyboard, Please press and hold on the Hand button.****Please note: We have no way of responding to your comments if you post them on the market! If you have a question, please email us: support@exideas.comMessagEase is based on several years of scientific research and uses letter frequency and di-gram data to optimize the position of letters and characters on a novel keyboard with fewer, larger buttons. (Thatâs why the letter positions are NON-QWERTY!)Please note: MessagEase comes with ample information on how it works, how to set it up and various settings. To reach this information, please tap and HOLD on the hand button.It also includes word prediction. To keep the package light, the word lists required for word prediction is provided in separate modules that you download optionally. Please long press on Hand and then go to Settings > Word Prediction for how to set it up.Please also note that you can change the keyboard size by dragging up/down on the Hand button. You can also reshape and recolor the keyboard in various ways. See Settings for details.If you like MessagEase, please tell others about it, and please make sure to rate and comment about it on Google Play.Again, please write to us if you encounter any issue.Thank you!

reviews.title: Best digital keyboard but...
reviews.comment: Just absolutely adore this keyboard. Suggestion: when in landscape mode & after splitting the keyboard to the sides, there\'s empty space in the middle? Cud you add something to that space? Like a regular qwerty w/ sliding/swype functionality? (word prediction still isn\'t that good on messagease). then. W/ both \"style\" keyboards, it would be the best of both worlds! Atleast until you incorporate word predictive \"sliding\" technology to the messagease layout. Tnx! Either way more power!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Best keyboard I\'ve used yet. Takes a little learning at the beginning, but soon becomes much faster and more accurate.
reviews.author: Alan Escreet

reviews.title: a fantastic keyboard!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using it for a week now, and while I\'m not at the speed of swiftkey, I\'m getting faster everyday.  It\'s amazing to have all the symbols available on the same keyboard. And not having to rely on autocorrect means that those annoying occasions where I have to type a name and the keyboard incorrectly corrects it is no more.  I\'ll be using this keyboard for a long time to come!
reviews.author: Sunjik Lee

reviews.title: The very best, amazing
reviews.comment: This keyboard is awesome, the more you use it,the more you want it, there\'s nothing compare to it, size, accuracy, and one of the best feature is that you\'re able to write in several languages at the same time.
reviews.author: Jose Venegas

reviews.title: My favorite keyboard
reviews.comment: After being a dedicated swype and swiftkey user I have found that messagease allows me to type faster and with less mistakes.  I have it on both my tablet and my cellphone.  No more pesky autocorrect errors. I could write a long letter with this keyboard, (and have), sometimes I don\'t hook up my bluetooth keyboard because this is easier.
reviews.author: Walter Von

reviews.title: great but annoying bugs
reviews.comment: this is a very clever keyboard concept. it has taken some time for this old dog to learn this new trick but i like it alot. tho i\'m still slower than on qwerty, i think i\'m faster overall due to fewer typos to fix. two annoyances: 1. when i start typing a new text immediately after sending a previous one (to the same recipient), the new text always starts with the last word of the previous text. 2. sometimes the smiley macros stop working and i have to reboot but that doesn\'t always fix it.
reviews.author: ronald chong

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using messagease for three days now and I\'m almost as fast as on my previous prefferd predictive keyboard, with far less mistakes to correct.... or miss!! Sliding the cursor to move the cursor is fantastic for the chunky thumbed like myself. Excellent stuff!!
reviews.author: Fintan Kavanagh

reviews.title: Fantastic Keyboard
reviews.comment: I\'ve always struggled with my phone\'s regular keyboard.. I would always accidently hit the wrong keys. But not anymore! With MessagEase, all of the keys are bigger, and the style is so much more accurate and fast. There\'s no way I\'m going back to the default QWERTY keyboard!
reviews.author: Justin Poon

reviews.title: #1 App of All Time
reviews.comment: I can\'t say enough good things about Messagease. Of course there is a bit of a learning curve to get used to the setup but after that, texting is far more accurate and speedy than even Swype. There is almost nothing wrong with this app. Great for large thumbed people (like myself) and can be used easily with one or two thumbs. Copy and past functions and commands such as hold for numbers, drag or spin for capital letters and \"arrow-like\" movement on spacebar and the right letters are fantastic!
reviews.author: Eric Jurgeson

reviews.title: AMAZING
reviews.comment: I downloaded this keyboard yesterday and has learned it using the games..PRO: it very easy on the brain and typing is fun unlike a deadly chore on qwerty.2) i use only one finger 3) very fast 3) no looking for keys..the finger finds its place automatically 4) very professionally assembled and there is a class approach to the app 5)big keys for most used alphabets..CON my 10 year old son dont like it and ask me to change it to the old qwert one 2) need some IQ (initially) and not for the dumb and feeble minded and who dont like challenges..the qwerty mode is 200 years old and it was made by placing the frequently used keys between less frequent ones so that the typing pieces dont get jammed in the old typewriter...IT IS PATHETIC THAT IN THIS AI WORLD WE ARE STILL USING THIS QWERT . TIME FOR THE GOVT TO BAN THE QWERT KEYBOARD.........................i strongly suggest everyone to download this keyboard,its game and english pack and STOP FOLLOWING THE CROWD........and i learned that the design is patented and based on a study on human response and brain
reviews.author: manoj ap

reviews.comment: Take the time to try and learn this...you kick the QWERTY keyboard to the curb and never look back!\tI continued to press the wrong key when using a QWERTY keyboard.  I kept blaming my chubby fingers and I tried other keyboards.  Nothing worked. Then I tried MessageEase.  I knew that I needed a little  practice time to get used to it.  But honestly, I only stumbled around for the first 2 days.  And I am now super fast & error free.  It\'s way faster than  QWERTY & it\'s customizable so you can swap characters you use more often in place of those you don\'t.  Also, customer service is A+++.
reviews.author: Deborah Roach

reviews.title: Terrific! Tiny hands or big screen? Look no further.
reviews.comment: Amazing. My hands are criminally small, and I can\'t reach all the way across my GS3 with single thumb typing. Worse, my stock keyboard has tiny keys, which makes me mess up everything. This keyboard solves all the problems, and improves my speed (with requisite practice, obviously). HIGHLY recommend this keyboard for anyone with similar problems, and even in general, for it\'s terrific speed. I will note the landscape version is not very good on my S3, so I use a separate manager to force another keyboard in landscape.
reviews.author: Freddy Lu

reviews.title: Just needs SPELL CHECK....
reviews.comment: I started using this a few years ago. I would watch my wife text A away, faster than fat people got to the supermarket when they heard Twinkies were back. (OK, maybe not that fast, but fast enough) anyways, I downloaded this app & I\'ll admit for a few weeks I was clueless. Soon after, I started getting faster & next thing I know, I was texting better than she was! If I can just make a small suggestion? Please add SPELL & GRAMMAR CHECK. I\'m a bad speller w. Dyslexia. Thank you for listening.
reviews.author: Ezra Rainstein

reviews.title: Just one word-excellent
reviews.comment: Just one word-excellent
reviews.author: suraj menon m

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I almost became as fast as qwerty
reviews.author: Mohamed mansy

reviews.title: Some accents do not work
reviews.comment: Very nice concept, makes typing multiple languages on the same keyboard really fast, even without prediction. One problem though is that it does not seem to support all accents, umlaut and acute works, but double acute does not.
reviews.author: Attila Tajti

reviews.title: here it is, your 5 stars
reviews.comment: Hey, this keyboard is really good, for all people, you must try it!
reviews.author: Amirul Rifqy Luqmana

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This is the best keyboard app I\'ve found so far ... Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Joseph Diebold

reviews.title: Great keyboard
reviews.comment: its an excellent keyboard but there are 2 problems with it. For some reason I always seem to hit the letter e when I\'m going for a space and secondly the word prediction box could be bigger
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: increible
reviews.comment: Este app es tan sencillo y eficaz, eso es lo que uno busca al escribir, sin dolores d cabeza y sin la sensacion d tener los dedos de un elefante. Este app me hace recobrar las ganas de escribir + de 100 txts al d\303\255a.  Le agregaria flechas d direccion y mejoras en la predicci\303\263n pero por lo dem\303\241s: Muy bueno!!
reviews.author: luci Obregon
